channel.title: I need item help
channel.description:
ok so i have 2 worlds 1 ftp and 1 member on the free world how do i make an item come up as Member Only? and if there wearing that item when then log int to remove it?
ok so i have it that you cant equipt it in mems world how can i get it to change the item name to Members Item like real rs

item.title: I need item help
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

noob pwner:

you need two seperate clients and you need to edit the class 8 in the ftp client to make all members items appear as “members object” and examine “you need to be a member to use this item”

No, theres a variable in the client that states whether the client is free or member.

Read full topic
